alert.note: Alert for Falls; Limestone; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McLennan, west central Limestone and north central Falls Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Robinson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, Robinson, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, Mart, Beverly Hills, Riesel, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Lake Creek Lake, Ben Hur, Watt, Asa, Axtell and Downsville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 329 and 338. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
